name: Staked Sherpa USD
description: SherpaEarn is a multi-chain yield vault that generates seamless returns on deposited USDC through on-chain delta-neutral strategies. These include positive carry capture, basis trading, volatility hedging, and other strategic arbitrage opportunities. Capital allocation is managed by Hedgemony, a digital asset fund that leverages machine learning models and quantitative analysis to deliver consistent, risk-optimized returns. The strategy emphasizes diversification, algorithmic rebalancing, and macro-level market awareness.
